title: League launches but everything is black
body: I can log into the game but once I do the middle of the screen is all black and loading. Whenever I click on Launch or Profile the game becomes unresponsive.

replies.body:
This often happens if your client is not able to download the content it's looking to grab from our servers. I recommend working through our [connection guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)to ensure your local network settings are 100% good.

Let me know if those steps helped.
Solved by going to Nvidia Control Panel and checking "Let 3D application decide".
